resources.string: The Four Kinematic Equations of Motion
You must specify a launch angle!

Thank you for downloading Kinematic Physics! Kinematic Physics is a tool to help solve Physics problems relating to motion using the kinematic equations. To use the tool, input as much information that you have, using Standard International (SI) units. Kinematic Physics will intelligently decide whether or not the situation is possible, if there are enough variables to solve the problem, and then select the appropriate equations to solve for the rest of the values. Kinematic Physics can also solve problems involving 2-Dimensional projectile motion, if the initial and final height of the projectile are the same. Remember, the kinematic equations can ONLY be used under constant acceleration! Please use this tool responsibly. This should be a tool to double check solutions, not to do your homework for you. Enjoy the app!
